description: Allows reading the value of a Custom Field set on a particular Employee.

customFieldId.description: Unique identifier of the Custom Field. Generated by Paycor.

legalEntityId.description: LegalEntityId that created the Custom Field.

fieldName.description: Name of the custom field, set at the Legal Entity level.

value.description:
Value of the custom field set for this employee.
Expected Datatype could be string, float, or date - depending on the setup of the LegalEntity Custom Field.

isRequired.description: Whether this custom field is required to be setup on each Employee.

customFieldsOptions.description: Valid list of values for a custom field (for appropriate types)

dateModified.description: Date when custom field value was last modified.

employee.description: The Resource Reference model is used to provide URL links to resources.

id.description: ID of the resource being referenced. This is generated by Paycor.

url.description: URL to reach the resource being referenced
